mapper.select: select r.id as noteResourceId, r.note_title, r.by_author, su.user_name as authorName, r.html_content, r.support_qty, r.create_date, r.update_date, r.edit_type, r.resource_type from note_resource as r left join sys_user su on r.by_author = su.id where r.id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into note_resource(note_title, by_author, html_content, edit_type, resource_type) values (#{noteTitle}, 1001, #{htmlContent}, #{editType}, #{resourceType})
mapper.update: update note_resource set note_title = #{noteTitle}, html_content = #{htmlContent}, edit_type = #{editType}, resource_type = #{resourceType}, update_date = sysdate() where id = #{noteResourceId}
